origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'StellarAPI.get_price_history', 'description': 'This function retrieves the price history of a specified cryptocurrency over a given duration.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'currency', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the cryptocurrency, e.g., Stellar.'}, {'name': 'duration', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time duration for which price history is needed, e.g., 6 months.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'price_history', 'description': 'A list of price data points over the specified duration.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 StellarAPI.get_price_history, 它的参数输入如下: 'currency'是'Stellar', 'duration'是'6 months'.
